About those built in CSS classes...

Padding:

  • pad1 - Adds 1% padding to all sides
  • pad2 - Adds 2% padding to all sides
  • pad3 - Adds 3% padding to all sides
  • pad4 - Adds 4% padding to all sides
  • pad5 - Adds 5% padding to all sides

Margin:

  • marg1 - Adds 1% margin to all sides
  • marg2 - Adds 2% margin to all sides
  • marg3 - Adds 3% margin to all sides
  • marg4 - Adds 4% margin to all sides
  • marg5 - Adds 5% margin to all sides

That's all I got for now :)
